solution_line_template: {num_foxes} foxes catch {weasels_per_fox_per_week} weasels each every week for a total of {num_foxes}*{weasels_per_fox_per_week} = <<{num_foxes}*{weasels_per_fox_per_week}={total_weasels_caught_per_week}>>{total_weasels_caught_per_week} weasels

{total_weasels_caught_per_week} weasels are caught every week for {num_weeks} weeks for a total of {total_weasels_caught_per_week}*{num_weeks} = <<{total_weasels_caught_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_weasels_caught_overall}>>{total_weasels_caught_overall} weasels

{num_foxes} foxes catch {rabbits_per_fox_per_week} rabbits each every week for a total of {num_foxes}*{rabbits_per_fox_per_week} = <<{num_foxes}*{rabbits_per_fox_per_week}={total_rabbits_caught_per_week}>>{total_rabbits_caught_per_week} rabbits

{total_rabbits_caught_per_week} rabbits are caught every week for {num_weeks} weeks for a total of {total_rabbits_caught_per_week}*{num_weeks} = <<{total_rabbits_caught_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_rabbits_caught_overall}>>{total_rabbits_caught_overall} rabbits

There were originally {initial_weasels} weasels so now there are {initial_weasels}-{total_weasels_caught_overall} = <<{initial_weasels}-{total_weasels_caught_overall}={weasels_left}>>{weasels_left} weasels left

There were originally {initial_rabbits} rabbits so now there are {initial_rabbits}-{total_rabbits_caught_overall} = <<{initial_rabbits}-{total_rabbits_caught_overall}={rabbits_left}>>{rabbits_left} rabbits left
There are {weasels_left}+{rabbits_left} = <<{weasels_left}+{rabbits_left}={total_animals_left}>>{total_animals_left} weasels and rabbits left
